name: Peace of Mind (VanPhan)
description:
Backstory

The world has been left in a nuclear winter due to war and now the world is run by aristocrats. Play as an escapee who is searching for their lost fiance. Walk around your childhood home and unlock the gate in order to find your lost love in the cold hell you call home. 

Control scheme:

WASD : Forward, Left, Back, Right movement

Mouse: To look around

Left Click: Interact

Shift: Sprint

Space: Jump

Credits:

Peace of Mind is a solo developed project I decided I would make in December 2021 which follows the structure of a game design course I was taking at the time. The project uses many assets and frameworks, all of which are mentioned below. I edited the texture maps in Unity using photoshop and edited the sounds/VA in audacity.

Tips [Spoilers]:

**If you get very stuck in the game**

To unlock the gate, you must interact (left click) with every terminal. The terminals' locations are indicated by the red beacons (there's 5 total). To complete the game, the player needs to just run pass the opened gate exit (located north from spawn, pass the dead forest).
